params.expiry: Time after which the approver's signature becomes invalid
params.operator: The account registering as an operator
params.salt: A unique and single use value associated with the approver signature.

params.operator: The address of the operator to deregister.
The address of the operator to register.
params.operatorSignature: The signature, salt, and expiry of the operator's signature.
